body.raw: # RainbowKit ## The best way to connect a wallet ðŸŒˆ RainbowKit makes it easy to add wallet connection to your dapp. It's intuitive, lightweight and customizable. ### Features - ðŸ”¥ Out-of-the-box wallet management - ðŸ‘Ÿ Easily customizable - ðŸ•Š Lightweight - âœ… Accessible - ðŸ¦„ Built on top of wagmi and ethers ### Community - Join the discussions on GitHub - Follow @rainbow on Twitter - Share your project
